headline: Charles River and Akron Bio Announce Collaboration to Enhance Operations with Integration of CGMP Materials into Cell Therapy Platform
summary: Charles River Laboratories International, Inc. and Akron Bio , a leading supplier of critical materials and services for advanced therapies, today announced the integration of Akron’s Closed System...
